alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Johns and southeastern Duval Counties through 700 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bayard, or near Fruit Cove, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... World Golf Village, South Ponte Vedra, Nocatee, Bayard, Durbin, Vilano Beach, Guana River State Park and South Ponte Vedra Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval
